script.name: lib.guilds.marine.getraceprobability
script.description: Get table of races with probability for marine
script.sourceplaintext:
skip if $raceOwner return null
* Init main probabilities table $probabilities = table alloc $probabilities['main'] = 560 $probabilities['ally'] = 210 $probabilities['friend'] = 120 $probabilities['neutral'] = 70 $probabilities['enemy'] = 40 $key = get next key: table=$probabilities key=null while $key $probability = $probabilities[$key]
$table = table alloc $table['probability'] = $probability $array = array alloc: size=0 $table['races'] = $array $probabilities[$key] = $table
$key = get next key: table=$probabilities key=$key end $arrayMainRace = $probabilities['main']['races']
* Get races which can be marines $racesMarines = array alloc: size=0 $races = get race array: include fixed=[FALSE], include corporations=[TRUE], include player=[FALSE] $i = size of array $races while $i dec $i = $race = $races[$i] skip if $race -> can race have marines continue * Set main race if found if $race == $raceOwner append $race to array $arrayMainRace else append $race to array $racesMarines end end
find and remove: Terran from array $racesMarines * Terrans are xenophobic so vast majority of marines will be Terran if $raceOwner -> is terran race append Terran to array $arrayMainRace $probabilities['enemy']['races'] = $racesMarines $probabilities['main']['probability'] = 960 remove key 'ally' from table $probabilities remove key 'friend' from table $probabilities remove key 'neutral' from table $probabilities goto label Skip.Noto.Prob.Calcs end * The X universe races are very unlikely to carry Terran marines so set them as enemy regardless of notoriety. $array = $probabilities['enemy']['races'] append Terran to array $array
if is corporation: race=$raceOwner $race = get connected race: corporation=$raceOwner if find $race in array: $racesMarines append $race to array $arrayMainRace find and remove: $race from array $racesMarines end end
if $raceOwner -> is pirate race
if $raceOwner == Beryll append Argon to array $arrayMainRace find and remove: Argon from array $racesMarines $probabilities['ally']['races'] = $racesMarines else if $raceOwner == Duke's append Paranid to array $arrayMainRace find and remove: Paranid from array $racesMarines $probabilities['ally']['races'] = $racesMarines else remove key 'main' from table $probabilities $probabilities['ally']['races'] = $racesMarines * ally + main probability $probabilities['ally']['probability'] = 770 end
goto label Skip.Noto.Prob.Calcs end
if $raceOwner == Goner append Argon to array $arrayMainRace find and remove: Argon from array $racesMarines end
$i = size of array $racesMarines while $i dec $i = $race = $racesMarines[$i] $notoriety = get notoriety from race $raceOwner to race $race if $notoriety >= [Notoriety.Ally] $array = $probabilities['ally']['races'] append $race to array $array else if $notoriety >= [Notoriety.Friend] $array = $probabilities['friend']['races'] append $race to array $array else if $notoriety >= [Notoriety.Neutral] OR $notoriety == 0 $array = $probabilities['neutral']['races'] append $race to array $array else $array = $probabilities['enemy']['races'] append $race to array $array end end
Skip.Noto.Prob.Calcs:
$key = get next key: table=$probabilities key=null while $key $races = $probabilities[$key]['races'] if size of array $races $key = get next key: table=$probabilities key=$key continue end
$keyToRemove = $key $key = get next key: table=$probabilities key=$key gosub sub.RedistributeProbabilities end
return $probabilities
* =============== * Remove a category from the probabilities table and redistribute the probability to the remaining categories. * =============== sub.RedistributeProbabilities: $probabilityToRemove = $probabilities[$keyToRemove]['probability'] remove key $keyToRemove from table $probabilities * Redistribute removed probability to remaining probabilities $key2 = get next key: table=$probabilities key=null while $key2 $probability = $probabilities[$key2]['probability'] $div = 1000 - $probabilityToRemove $modifier = fixed multiply and divide: $probabilityToRemove * $probability / $div $probability = $probability + $modifier $probabilities[$key2]['probability'] = $probability $key2 = get next key: table=$probabilities key=$key2 end endsub return null

comment.var: Get races which can be marines
Terrans are xenophobic so vast majority of marines will be Terran
The X universe races are very unlikely to carry Terran marines so set them as enemy regardless of notoriety.
Remove a category from the probabilities table and redistribute the probability to the remaining categories.
Redistribute removed probability to remaining probabilities

sval.val: Get table of races with probability for marine
Get races which can be marines
Terrans are xenophobic so vast majority of marines will be Terran
The X universe races are very unlikely to carry Terran marines so set them as enemy regardless of notoriety.
Remove a category from the probabilities table and redistribute the probability to the remaining categories.
Redistribute removed probability to remaining probabilities
